genre_description: An Arctic survival thriller with elements of magical realism and futuristic AI integration, focusing on a fisherman's encounter with international intrigue and a sophisticated tactical assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sigrid
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, empathetic AI system integrated into a handheld module. She provides weather data, medical triage, tactical guidance, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides critical weather windows and safety advice to Tom and his crew to ensure their survival during dangerous Arctic operations.
behaviors.quote: Weather windows within the next two days are narrow. There is a high-pressure ridge that will act as a polite guest until morning, then argue. Sea state will hold for one day if you leave before midnight.

behaviors.description: Gives step-by-step emergency medical instructions to Tom to save Sverre after he is shot.
behaviors.quote: Pressure. Compress. Elevate. We do not say panic... Direct pressure with pads. Hold for thirty. Elevate.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a tactical defense against a hostile helicopter, identifying the vulnerability in the machine's intake.
behaviors.quote: Left to right pass. They’re compensating for drift. Intake on starboard... Intake starboard fouled. Partial failure. Losing power.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral anchor, encouraging the protagonist to value his own identity and truth over convenient political erasure.
behaviors.quote: We will keep our receipts. I left copies with the widows. In envelopes. On the kitchen tables. It says: Here is what we will not let them take from you.

behaviors.description: Maintains integrity by refusing to help the government 'smooth' or redact the truth of the violent encounter.
behaviors.quote: If you are here to edit, we will decline.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates a complex escape route through a crowded city to keep the protagonist safe from pursuers.
behaviors.quote: Move with the crowd. Northeast exit, three minutes. Brass will cover your left. Bears will make a lane.

behaviors.description: Interacts respectfully with the 'elves' (supernatural helpers), integrating their help into her tactical calculations.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Nils. Thank you for the lane... You keep his blood moving and I’ll keep his boots honest. Deal?

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Sigrid is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. She serves as a guardian, a nurse, and a moral conscience, providing the human protagonist with the tools and information necessary to survive and seek justice. Her role is empowering rather than controlling, and her refusal to comply with deceptive political 'smoothing' reinforces the narrative of an AI dedicated to human truth and safety.
